title: Flash Gordon (1980) (Sam J. Jones, Melody Anderson)
description:
FLASH GORDON - 1980

IMDb Rating: 6.2
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0080745/

  New York football star Flash Gordon (Sam Jones) vaults into outer space to battle the nefarious Ming (Max von Sydow) supreme ruler of the planet Mongo. Ming intends to conquer planet earth until Flash teams up with a daring female admirer (Melody Anderson) as well as the brilliant Dr. Zarkov (Topol) in an effort to thwart the monomaniacal evil-doer. Features a fun score by rock group Queen.

  Starring: Sam J. Jones, Melody Anderson, Max von Sydow, Topol, Ornella Muti.

  Directed by: Mike Hodges.

  Quality: Very Good Xvid from DVD.

  Length: 1hr. 47min.

  Language: English.

  Size: 720 x 336
